actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide joint and survivors' annuity benefits under private pension plans based upon the participant's vested benefit.

summary.text: Provides that pension or annuity plans to qualify for tax-exempt status under the Internal Revenue Code shall provide for payments to the participant's survivor beginning on the earliest date that the participant could have collected annuity benefits under such plan.

titles.title: A bill to provide joint and survivors' annuity benefits under private pension plans based upon the participant's vested benefit.
